talk.utter: Thank you!! Retroflexes and voiced consonants were my goals for this language.

talk.author: did:plc:tj7c3n75bnzoona6wewptnd6
talk.utter: we like seeing retroflexes just because they seem to be rare in conlangs for some reason (in our experience at least)

talk.author: did:plc:rynleh4ppsdhl4wfvw2b6jqp
talk.utter:
A lot of people find them hard to say, and I find some don't associate retroflexes with any theme or genre, so they don't think of it as inspiration.
Personally though, I love how they interact with vowels.
